TopicTitle: Is there a way to get a ship to fly autonomously while doing another thing like flying another ship

Articles.Content:
I'm playing in 1.9.1 and i was wondering if there is a mod that allows you to set up a maneuver or something of the sort and have the mod execute it while you are flying another ship?  

This is a duplicate however I don't know how to delete my own post sooo yes.
